subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalie Henrik Lundqvist saved all three of the Penguins shots in the shootout — keeping him unscored upon in shootouts this season — and Brendan Shanahan scored on the Rangers’ first attempt.
snippet: Goalie Henrik Lundqvist saved all three of the Penguins shots in the shootout — keeping him unscored upon in shootouts this season — and Brendan Shanahan scored on the Rangers’ first attempt.
